Got this error when trying to edit window working sets. It is probably caused by screwed Mylar's task working sets, since I lost my task list folder but working sets are still there. Still, IDE UI should be able to recover and delete those broken working sets.

Just noticed Mylar classes in the stack trace.
This is quite bad. I can't even select any working sets anywhere in the Workbench.

Fixed.  Problem was likely a project that went missing which we should now be robust to.

By "Mylar classes in the stack trace" I assume you mean "Mylyn classes" and not that you have another stack trace with some old Mylar plug-ins that are still active.
An updated dev build will be on the e3.3 site within the hour.

> Fixed.  Problem was likely a project that went missing which we should now be robust to.

That is weird. I don't recall having any resources in those working sets.

BTW, is it my lucky day or everyone else also can't see reply buttons/icons on the comments in this editor?
